title: Flood in Lekki
article: Lekki community needs your help for crisis management from 3 days of non-stop flooding.

title: Should You Focus on Charity?
article: Emergency! A tsunami has just hit Malika, Tarasudi District. Help our affected brothers and sisters.

title: Help African Children
article: African children need your help to get proper food and water. Prolonged crisis is a real urgency.
